headline: Trump-endorsed Senate candidate Herschel Walker supports a total abortion ban: 'there's no exception in my mind'
author: Katherine Tangalakis-Lippert
sentences: Following a campaign event on Wednesday, Georgia GOP candidate for Senate Herschel Walker said he supports a total abortion ban with no exception for rape, incest, or the health of the mother.
The Georgia state primary election is set to take place Tuesday, with Herschel, a Trump-endorsed GOP candidate, leading in the polls and likely to secure the Republican nomination for Senate.

Walker's campaign confirmed to Insider that the former professional football player turned politician "is unapologetically pro-life with no exceptions."

Herschel Walker on Wednesday said he supports a total abortion ban with no exceptions for rape or incest.
Should he secure the nomination, Walker will face off against incumbent Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock in November.
